Package com.github.sanity4j.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    StartElementListener
    StartElementListener - listener interface called by JaxbMarshaller when iterating through an XML document.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExternalProcessRunner
    Runs an external process.
    ExtractStats
    Utility class for extracting statistics from the various tool's XML outputs.
    FileUtil
    FileUtil - File related utility methods.
    JaxbMarshaller
    JaxbMarshaller - utility for marshalling/unmarshalling Objects to/from XML using JAXB.
    PipeInputThread
    PipeInputThread - A thread to pipe data between an input and output stream.
    QaLogger
    Since the QA task can utilise several logging libs, it needs to provide its own logging facade.
    QaLoggerAntImpl
    This class acts as wrapper for an Ant Project, so that the bulk of the classes can avoid a direct dependence on Ant.
    QaLoggerMavenImpl
    This class acts as wrapper for a Maven QA Mojo, so that the bulk of the classes can avoid a direct dependence on Maven.
    QaLoggerSystemOutImpl
    This logger implementation just uses System.out / System.err to print message for running from a command-line, within eclipse etc.
    QaUtil
    QaUtil - General utility methods.
    RegexpReplaceInputStream
    An InputStream implementation that replaced a regexp within the original stream with a replacement regexp string "on the fly".
    StringUtil
    StringUtil - String related utility methods.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Tool
    An enumeration of available tools.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    QAException
    This exception can be thrown to indicate a failure in the QA process.
